CustomField.formula: IF( NOT(ISBLANK( Timestamp_Closed_Date__c )), Timestamp_Closed_Date__c - Created_Date_Time__c , IF(NOT(ISBLANK( Timestamp_Go_Live_Scheduled_Time__c )), Timestamp_Go_Live_Scheduled_Time__c - Created_Date_Time__c , IF(NOT(ISBLANK( Timestamp_Job_Live_Time__c )), Timestamp_Job_Live_Time__c - Created_Date_Time__c , Timestamp_Lost_Time__c - Created_Date_Time__c )))
CustomField.label: Days Created to Closed
